api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about a user by username.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The username to retrieve info for.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve card details based on exact name.

required_parameters.name: exact
required_parameters.description: The exact card name to search for.

query: Can you provide information about user 'eekspider' on BoardGameGeek? Also, I want exact details of the card named 'Black Lotus' from the Scryfall Magic: The Gathering database.
